mapper.select: SELECT f.fno AS `fno` , f.uno AS `uno` , f.pno AS `pno` , f.eno AS `eno` , f.create_date AS `create_date` , f.content AS `content` , f.ctype AS `ctype` , f.thumbnail AS `thumbnail` , f.tag AS `tag` , u.nick_name AS `nick_name` , u.profile_pic AS `profile_pic` , ( SELECT COUNT(fr.frno) FROM `feed_reply` fr WHERE fr.fno = f.fno ) AS `reply_num` , ( SELECT CONCAT(`writer_nick_name`, ':', `content`) FROM `feed_reply_view` frv WHERE frv.parent_reply IS NULL AND frv.fno = f.fno ORDER BY frv.like_num DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS `reply_content` , ( SELECT COUNT(fl.lno) FROM `feed_like` fl WHERE fl.fno = f.fno ) AS `like_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(fl.lno) FROM `feed_like` fl WHERE fl.fno = f.fno AND fl.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_like` , ( SELECT COUNT(fd.dno) FROM `feed_dibs` fd WHERE fd.fno = f.fno ) AS `dibs_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(fd.dno) FROM `feed_dibs` fd WHERE fd.fno = f.fno AND fd.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_dibs` FROM ( SELECT `fno` FROM `feed` WHERE `uno` IN ( SELECT `following` FROM `user_follow` WHERE `follower` = #{uno} ) OR `uno` = #{uno} ORDER BY `fno` DESC LIMIT ${num} , 20 ) t JOIN `feed` f ON t.fno = f.fno JOIN `user` u ON f.uno = u.uno ORDER BY `fno` DESC
select count(`fno`) from feed where uno = #{value}
